original_text: And their word will eat as doth a canker: of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus;
korean_text: 그들의 말은 악성 종양이 퍼져나감과 같은데 그 중에 후메내오와 빌레도가 있느니라

sentences.original_text: And their word will eat as doth a canker:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 말은 암과 같이 먹혀 들 것이며

sentences.original_text: of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus;
